qas.question: What is the name of the largest European aquarium?
What does the state agency Ciencia Viva promote?

answers.text: scientific and technological culture among the Portuguese population

qas.question: What are some examples of notable organizations focused on scientific exhibitions?

answers.text: Science Museum of the University of Coimbra, the National Museum of Natural History at the University of Lisbon, and the Visionarium

context: Portugal has the largest aquarium in Europe, the <a0_0>Lisbon Oceanarium<a0_0/>, and the Portuguese have several other notable organizations focused on science-related exhibits and divulgation, like the state agency Ciência Viva, a programme of the Portuguese Ministry of Science and Technology to the promotion of a <a1_0>scientific and technological culture among the Portuguese population<a1_0/>, the <a2_0>Science Museum of the University of Coimbra, the National Museum of Natural History at the University of Lisbon, and the Visionarium<a2_0/>.
